name: .BC! File Extension
summary: Learn about .BC! files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Unfinished download started with BitComet, a BitTorrent program; created when the download begins and changes to the correct file type when the download is completed.

content: BitComet downloads can typically be resumed if the download is stopped or interrupted, as long as the file is available on a BitTorrent server.
